title: Mobile Troubleshooting - Wi-Fi Hotspot Not Working
description: A customer is trying to use their phone as a Wi-Fi hotspot, but other devices cannot connect.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's plan includes a mobile hotspot feature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the plan has hotspot capability.

tasks.description: Guide the customer to check their hotspot settings on their phone, including the password and network name (SSID).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for checking hotspot settings.

tasks.description: Reset the network settings on the customer's device to resolve any configuration glitches.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent guides the customer through a network settings reset.
